data.text: @TheTalkCBS I did let him come back but he really gaff to prove himself, i didn't meet the child until like 6 months later and now i could imagine my life without him he is now 10 years old, he is so respectful and he does call me mom.

@TheTalkCBS My husband cheated on me, he's says he didn't because we were (separated)
But we're still married w weren't divorced so i say it was cheating any how he had a child with this person. We then stayed separated for 18 more months, after 18 months he asked to come back into pout home
@TheTalkCBS Don't care if they are miserable or not, just so long as they are gone!
@TheTalkCBS @AlexPallNY i have had my ex cheated on me i dont want him to be miserable but i wouldnt want to be around him either i wish him all the happiness but just wont be with me

@TheTalkCBS By calling women “hos and bitches” if your MAN cheated on you,  aren’t you giving men a pass as they aren’t to blame. What happened to#TimesUp and making men accontable for their acctions.#MeToo
@TheTalkCBS No Adventures they're going to do something stupid, to somebody else the same way.💯✌✊👊☺😆
@TheTalkCBS People Do What They Can Live With...My Success would be the Best Revenge #UdoU
@TheTalkCBS Is not up to us to make anyone miserable
@TheTalkCBS Hell Yes, feel as bad as I do so you will understand my pain.
@TheTalkCBS Yes but only for as long as I am miserable and hurt. lol. I would eventually hope they would find happiness while at the same time realizing what they have lost.
@TheTalkCBS Yes!  He wasn’t concerned about making his girlfriend miserable! He only cares about himself
@TheTalkCBS I don’t want to make them miserable. I want them to accept responsibility for their actions #EverybodyTalks
@TheTalkCBS Cheaters are already miserable, so no difference for them.
@TheTalkCBS I would want that person out of my life, no second chances, I would have no respect for them

@TheTalkCBS Having trust issues, I would find it hard to forgive. If the person is important to me, I would work to forgive. Stating your miserable is something the individual has to work on. Can’t make the other feel guilty and be quick to forgive.
@TheTalkCBS I'd want them to take responsibility for their actions and then talk it out.  When she outed him, that took reconciliation off the table. #Everybodytalks
@TheTalkCBS Yes, it's only fair that person made you miserable.
